text: Aliko Dangote GCON (born 10 April 1957) is a Nigerian business magnate, investor, and owner of the Dangote Group, which has interests in commodities in Nigeria and other African countries. As of March 2018, he had an estimated net worth of US$11.2 billion.Net worth as of March 2018 per Forbes. In November 2021, Sani Dangote, the Vice President (VP) of the Dangote Group and younger brother of Aliko Dangote, died. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:Billionaires Category:Living people Category:People from Kano State Category:Al-Azhar University alumni
title: Aliko Dangote
